text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Hotel" means an establishment that offers sleeping accommodations for compensation.

text.section: "Hotel rental tax" means the tax authorized under this subtitle.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraphs (2) and (3) of this subsection, "transient charge" means a hotel charge for sleeping accommodations for a period not exceeding 4 consecutive months.
In Frederick County, Garrett County, and Washington County, "transient charge" means a hotel charge for sleeping accommodations for a period not exceeding 30 days.
In Carroll County, "transient charge" means a hotel charge for sleeping accommodations for a period not exceeding 25 days.
"Transient charge" does not include any hotel charge for services or for accommodations other than sleeping accommodations.
